name: EZ-Mill® Grain Conditioner
description: EZ-Mill® Grain Conditioner is a low inclusion processing aid for rolled and steam flaked grain including corn sorghum, wheat and barley. EZ-Mill is used to increase production and improve quality.EZ-Millhas a low inclusionrate,the most common use range is from 1 to 4 oz. (30 to 114 gm) per ton of ration to be flaked or rolled.
